thread.title: Video: Timelapse shows massive tornado building over South Dakota
thread.title_full: Video: Timelapse shows massive tornado building over South Dakota - Telegraph

author: Telegraph Video , video source Newsflare
title: Video: Timelapse shows massive tornado building over South Dakota
text: A massive tornado builds in the stormy sky in this amazing footage taken earlier this month in South Dakota . The dramatic stormy sky takes on an increasingly tornado-like shape (Newsflare) Cars pass by the storm as the camera records how it grows and changes in shape. The weather get stormier and plants by the side of the road are flattened by the wind. Cars pass by as the storm builds (Newsflare) The uploader later wrote online: "This storm was a long-lived supercell that was tornado-warned for a few hours. "[It was the] first one of the day in northeastern South Dakota on Friday July 17 2015 near Lake City, SD."
